Register to Vote in Illinois.sectiontext: Anyone eligible to vote in Illinois may register online. If you have previously registered, even if you think that nothing has changed, it is always a good idea to check that you are still registered.

Register to Vote in Illinois.title: Check Your Registration
Register to Vote in Illinois.description: Before election day, make sure you are still registered to vote. Perhaps you have moved, changed your name, or live in a neighborhood that changed zip codes. Even if nothing has changed, itâ€™s a good idea to check to make sure your voter registration is still active.
